mapper.select: select * from member_tbl where member_id = #{memberId} and member_pw = #{memberPw}
mapper.insert: insert into member_tbl values( member_tbl_seq.nextval, #{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{memberAge}, #{memberAddr}, #{memberPhone}, 3, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') )
mapper.update: update member_tbl set member_level = #{memberLevel} where member_no = #{memberNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from member_tbl where member_name like '%'||'${memberName}'||'%'
